testsuite.name: PairingAlgorithm Tests

testcase.name: Should handle edge case with exactly 4 players
Should select different player combinations across multiple rounds
Should select exactly 4 players for a round
Should distribute player usage as evenly as possible
Should fail when less than 4 players available
Should prefer combinations with lower frequency
Should select different players across rounds avoiding repetition
